en.voiceNotSupported: Voice recognition is not supported on this device.
en.voiceNotAvailable: Voice recognition is not available on this device.
en.micPermissionDenied: Microphone permission denied. Please allow microphone access.
en.voiceCaptureFailed: We could not capture your voice. Please try again.
en.unableStartListening: Unable to start listening. Please try again.
en.initialGreeting: Voice assistant activated. Press Start Listening and speak slowly. Your words will appear on the screen for staff to read.
en.copyFailed: Unable to copy. Please copy manually.
en.emptyPromptLine2: Your voice will be converted to text.
en.footerNote: This tool converts speech to text to assist with communication.

hi.voiceNotSupported: Is device par voice recognition support nahi hai.
hi.voiceNotAvailable: Is device par voice recognition available nahi hai.
hi.micPermissionDenied: Microphone permission deny ho gayi. Kripya microphone access allow karein.
hi.voiceCaptureFailed: Aapki awaaz capture nahi ho payi. Kripya dobara try karein.
hi.unableStartListening: Listening start nahi ho pa raha. Kripya dobara try karein.
hi.initialGreeting: Voice assistant chalu ho gaya hai. Start Listening dabaiye aur dheere boliye. Aapki baat screen par text me dikhai degi.
hi.copyFailed: Copy nahi ho paaya. Kripya manually copy karein.
hi.listeningResumed: Listening fir se chalu ho gaya.
hi.emptyPromptLine2: Aapki awaaz text me convert hogi.
hi.footerNote: Yeh tool speech ko text me convert karta hai taaki communication asaan ho.

mr.voiceNotSupported: Ya device var voice recognition support nahi.
mr.voiceNotAvailable: Ya device var voice recognition upalabdh nahi.
mr.micPermissionDenied: Microphone permission nakarli geli. Krupaya microphone access dya.
mr.voiceCaptureFailed: Tumcha awaz capture karta ala nahi. Krupaya punha prayatna kara.
mr.unableStartListening: Listening suru karta yet nahi. Krupaya punha prayatna kara.
mr.initialGreeting: Voice assistant suru jhala aahe. Start Listening daba ani halue bola. Tumcha awaz screen var text madhe disel.
mr.copyFailed: Copy karta ala nahi. Krupaya manually copy kara.
mr.footerNote: He tool speech la text madhe convert karte, communication sathi upyogi aahe.

gu.voiceNotSupported: Aa device par voice recognition support nathi.
gu.voiceNotAvailable: Aa device par voice recognition available nathi.
gu.micPermissionDenied: Microphone permission deny thai gayi. Krupaya microphone access allow karo.
gu.voiceCaptureFailed: Tamaro voice capture thai shakyo nathi. Krupaya fari prayatna karo.
gu.unableStartListening: Listening start thai shakatu nathi. Krupaya fari prayatna karo.
gu.initialGreeting: Voice assistant chalu chhe. Start Listening dabavo ane dhime bolo. Tamara shabdo screen par text tariqe dekhashe.
gu.copyFailed: Copy thai shakyu nathi. Krupaya manually copy karo.
gu.emptyPromptLine2: Tamaro voice text ma convert thashe.
gu.footerNote: Aa tool speech ne text ma convert kare chhe jethi communication asaan bane.
